attrs.name: data
attrs.desc: Transfer data source

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Bound Value

attrs.name: filterable
attrs.desc: Searchable
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: filter-placeholder
attrs.desc: Search box placeholder
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is Please enter the search content.

attrs.name: filter-method
attrs.desc:
Set the search filtering field of the shuttle box. This attribute is valid only when RenderType is set to table. //Customize the search method parameter 
arg1:String Input filter string 
arg2:Object Each data item

attrs.name: titles
attrs.desc: User-defined list title
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is ['List1','List2']

attrs.name: button-texts
attrs.desc: Custom Button Copywriting
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is []

attrs.name: render-content
attrs.desc: Customized data item rendering function; arg1:{Function for creating a virtual node}, arg2:{Object data item}

attrs.name: format
attrs.desc: Selected status copywriting at the top of the list
attrs.defaultValue: The default value for this attribute is {noChecked: '${checked}/${total}', hasChecked: '${checked}/${total}'}

attrs.name: props
attrs.desc: Field alias of the data source

attrs.name: left-default-checked
attrs.desc: Key array of selected items in the list on the left in the initial state
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is []

attrs.name: right-default-checked
attrs.desc: Key array of selected items in the list on the right in the initial state
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is []

attrs.name: target-order
attrs.desc: Sorting policy of elements in the right list: If the value is original, the sequence of elements in the right list is the same as that in the data source. If the value is push, the newly added element is ranked last. If the value is unshift, the newly added element is ranked first. The value of this attribute can be original / push / unshift
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is original.

attrs.name: to-left-disable
attrs.desc: Provides users to control the disabled status of the shuttle button. If the button is not selected during component initialization, the disabled status is displayed. The default value is true.

attrs.name: to-right-disable
attrs.desc: Provides users to control the disabled status of the shuttle button. If the button is not selected during component initialization, the disabled status is displayed. The default value is true.

attrs.name: show-all-btn
attrs.desc: All Move Buttons
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: drop-config
attrs.desc: Set the list items in the shuttle box to be dragged.

attrs.name: columns
attrs.desc: Sets the table column configuration of the shuttle box. This attribute is valid only when RenderType is set to table. Sets the table column configuration of the shuttle box. This attribute is valid only when the rendering type (renderType) is grid.

attrs.name: page-vo
attrs.desc: Sets the pagination configuration. This attribute is valid only when the rendering type is grid and must be used together with pager-op.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this property is {currentPage:1,pageSize:10}

attrs.name: show-pager
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display pagination. This parameter is valid only when tables are rendered.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: pager-op
attrs.desc: Sets the pagination configuration. This parameter is valid when the table is rendered.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {mode:'fixed', pageVO: {currentPage: 1,pageSize: 10}

attrs.name: render
attrs.desc: When plugin is set to Table, set the rendering to table. When the plugin is set to Tree

attrs.name: tree-op
attrs.desc: Set the tree-related configuration attributes when the plug-in is set to tree.

slots.name: left-footer
slots.desc: Content at the bottom of the left list

slots.name: right-footer
slots.desc: Content at the bottom of the list on the right

slots.name: default
slots.desc: Content of a user-defined data item. The parameter is {option}.

methods.name: clearQuery
methods.desc: Clear the search keywords of a panel.

events.name: change
left-check-change
events.desc:
This event is triggered when an element in the list on the left is selected or deselected. //Parameter arg1: List of selected data values on the left of the Array shuttle box.
//Parameter arg2: List of selected data values whose status changes on the left of the Array shuttle box

events.name: right-check-change
events.desc:
This event is triggered when an element in the list on the right is selected or deselected. //Parameter arg1: list of selected data values on the right of the Array shuttle box.
//Parameter arg2: list of selected data values whose status changes on the right of the Array shuttle box
